knowledgeBase: AWS Service Screener V2 - Report Generation Framework
purpose: Official AWS open-source tool for automated service configuration checks and report generation
relevance: CRITICAL - AWS's own implementation of automated WAFR-style assessments with HTML report generation and WA Tool integration

overview.description: Open source guidance tool for AWS environments that runs automated checks and provides recommendations based on AWS and community best practices
overview.cost: FREE (covered under AWS Free Tier, <$0.01 per run if exceeded)

architecture.api_approach: Multiple 'describe' and 'get' API calls to determine environment configuration
architecture.report_format: HTML dashboard with left navigation + JSON outputs

1_automated_checks.description: Runs automated checks on AWS service configurations
1_automated_checks.approach: Uses AWS APIs (describe/get calls) to collect configuration data

3_well_architected_tool_integration.description: Can create workloads and milestones directly in AWS WA Tool

parameters.region: AWS region where WA workload will be created
parameters.reportName: Name of the workload (use existing name to update)
parameters.newMileStone: 1 to create new milestone each time, 0 to create only if none exists

3_well_architected_tool_integration.why_critical: This proves AWS's own tool integrates with WA Tool - validates your approach!

4_suppression_mechanism.description: Allows ignoring specific findings via JSON file
4_suppression_mechanism.use_case: Clients can suppress false positives or accepted risks

5_tag_based_filtering.description: Filter resources based on AWS tags
5_tag_based_filtering.use_case: Assess only production workloads or specific departments

6_multi_region_support.description: Can run across multiple regions or all regions

7_service_selection.description: Can check all services or specific services

8_beta_features.description: Opt-in to beta checks for latest features

9_migration_evaluation_support.description: For AWS Partners conducting migration evaluations
9_migration_evaluation_support.use_case: Track assessments for AWS Migration Acceleration Program

dashboard_components: Left navigation pane - List of services checked
Main content area - Findings and recommendations
Expandable checks - Click to see details
Resource list - Which resources were flagged
Remediation guidance - How to fix issues

api_raw_json.description: Raw findings from all API calls

api_full_json.description: Full results in structured JSON format
api_full_json.use_case: Integration with other tools, data processing

hosting_requirements.critical_note: Generated report MUST be hosted locally and MUST NOT be internet accessible
hosting_requirements.reason: Security - report may contain sensitive infrastructure details

iam_permissions: Read permissions for all services (sample policy provided)
prerequisites.cost: Free under AWS Free Tier, <$0.01 if exceeded

steps: 2. Launch AWS CloudShell in any region
installation.installation_script:
cd /tmp
python3 -m venv .
source bin/activate
python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip
rm -rf service-screener-v2
git clone https://github.com/aws-samples/service-screener-v2.git
cd service-screener-v2
pip install -r requirements.txt
python3 unzip_botocore_lambda_runtime.py
alias screener='python3 $(pwd)/main.py'

usage_examples.name: Recommended: All services with beta features

why_service_screener_matters: 1. AWS's official open-source implementation (validates your approach)
2. Already has WA Tool integration (you can use same API approach)

1_report_ui_pattern.implementation: Use Service Screener's HTML template as reference

2_suppression_mechanism.why: Clients need to suppress false positives
2_suppression_mechanism.implementation: Same JSON structure in your Report Agent

3_json_outputs.implementation: Generate both formats from your Report Agent

4_wa_tool_api_calls.why: AWS's own tool does this - validates your KB #2
4_wa_tool_api_calls.implementation: Study Service Screener's WA Tool integration code

5_tag_filtering.why: Enterprises need to assess specific environments

3_automated_answering.service_screener: Only checks configuration, doesn't answer WAFR questions
3_automated_answering.your_platform: Answers 50+ WAFR questions + creates WA Tool workload

4_multi_agent_intelligence.your_platform: Multi-agent system with Discovery, Assessment, Validation, Report agents

development_guide.purpose: Guide for contributing new service checks

comparison_matrix.feature: Service Screener V2 vs. Your Platform

1_wa_tool_integration_is_proven.insight: AWS's own open-source tool integrates with WA Tool
1_wa_tool_integration_is_proven.action: Study Service Screener's WA Tool integration code

2_html_json_dual_output.insight: AWS provides both human-readable (HTML) and machine-readable (JSON) outputs
2_html_json_dual_output.validation: Your Report Agent should do the same

3_suppression_is_essential.insight: Enterprise clients need to suppress known issues
3_suppression_is_essential.validation: Not a nice-to-have, it's a must-have

4_tag_filtering_for_enterprises.insight: Large organizations use tags to separate environments
4_tag_filtering_for_enterprises.action: Add to Discovery Agent (filter by env=prod, department, etc.)

5_report_must_be_local.insight: AWS emphasizes: 'MUST NOT be internet accessible'
5_report_must_be_local.validation: Security is paramount for infrastructure reports

6_beta_flag_for_innovation.insight: AWS uses --beta flag to test new features
6_beta_flag_for_innovation.validation: Clients want choice: stable vs. latest features
6_beta_flag_for_innovation.action: Implement feature flags in your platform

phase_1_study: Run it on a test AWS account
Study the generated HTML report structure
phase_2_adopt: Adopt HTML report UI pattern (left nav + expandable checks)
Study WA Tool API calls (CreateWorkload, CreateMilestone)
Add tag-based filtering to Discovery Agent

marketing_messages.positioning: Built on AWS's proven open-source framework, enhanced with AI-powered discovery and GenAI assessment
proof_points: Based on AWS Service Screener V2 (518 stars, 22+ contributors)
Uses same WA Tool integration as AWS's official tool
Only platform with GenAI Lens assessment
marketing_messages.competitive_angle: Service Screener V2 is for DevOps teams who love CLI. We're for business stakeholders who need results in 20 minutes, not 8 hours.
